Head of the Sforza Ranger:
A few materials are needed to create the Blackbird Clan Talisman. The most important of them is the Demon Crystal.
The easiest way to get it is by completing one of our assignments and receiving the Box of Supplies as a reward. Then you will only have to collect the remaining materials, and for a small fee we will produce for you the Blackbird Clan Talisman!
This talisman is a sign of special gratitude to those who help our clan. Haha!
